metadata.title: USN-4620-1 -- phpLDAPadmin vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that phpLDAPadmin didn't properly sanitize before being echoed to the user. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary HTML/Javascript code in a user's context and cause a crash, resulting in denial of service or potential execution of arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4620-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  phpldapadmin - 1.2.2-6ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
